text:
In a fast-paced corporate environment, in time, people end up killing their human side in exchange for the illusion that carrying their hearts along with their jobs would make them feel weak in the business world.

That's why I invited Andrew Tarvin, speaker, best-selling author, and coach who teaches people and organizations how to use humor effectively while having fun to discuss the pursuit for success, wealth, and happiness. <https://resources.rockcontent.com/jam-session-andrew-tarvin?utm_source=superpath&utm_medium=slack|Join us>!

attachments.title: [WEBINAR] Content Experience Jam Session with Andrew Tarvin
attachments.text: The pursuit of success, wealth, and happiness is about working hard, but also about having joy with what you work. Join Andrew Tarvin for this webinar! Watch live or on-demand.
attachments.fallback: [WEBINAR] Content Experience Jam Session with Andrew Tarvin

elements.text:
In a fast-paced corporate environment, in time, people end up killing their human side in exchange for the illusion that carrying their hearts along with their jobs would make them feel weak in the business world.

That's why I invited Andrew Tarvin, speaker, best-selling author, and coach who teaches people and organizations how to use humor effectively while having fun to discuss the pursuit for success, wealth, and happiness.

text:
Hey! I'm Marisol, growth lead @ Clarity, we're building the app for your love life & would love to get some insight on what you look for in a relationship app. 

You can find us here: <https://clarityapp.io|https://clarityapp.io>

What would would you like to see? Would you recommend it to friends? If you could make any changes what would they be?

attachments.title: Clarity - The App for Your Love Life
attachments.text: Clarity is a relationship wellness platform that gives you everything you need to successfully navigate every aspect and facet of your love life, through a safe and discreet community that encourages unfiltered conversation and an ever-growing content library of 300+ lessons from 50+ renowned experts.
attachments.fallback: Clarity: Clarity - The App for Your Love Life
